1082.question: What systems are tested?

4-Table2-1.png: The systems being tested are VoxCeleb-based systems.
4-Table1-1.png: The systems being tested are BULATS and Linguaskill.

1082.answer:
BULATS i-vector/PLDA
BULATS x-vector/PLDA
VoxCeleb x-vector/PLDA
PLDA adaptation (X1)
 Extractor fine-tuning (X2)
